title: Wise Old Man tasks

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Wise Old Man can assign various tasks on member worlds and give small rewards in return.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Wise Old Man/Tasks
Wise Old Man tasks
Released 6 June 2005 (Update)
Type Minigame
Members Yes
Location Draynor Village
Participants 1
Skills None
Reward currency None
Tutorial No
Music None

The Wise Old Man can assign various tasks on member worlds and give small rewards in return.

The most common tasks are to fetch between 3 and 15 of one of the following items (this list may not be exhaustive). They can be brought in more than one load. The Wise Old Man doesn't accept bank notes, as they have no use to him.

Contents

  • 1 Item delivery
    • 1.1 Easy task items
    • 1.2 Hard task items
  • 2 Letter delivery
  • 3 The thing under the bed
  • 4 Rewards
    • 4.1 Coins
    • 4.2 Gems
    • 4.3 Runes
    • 4.4 Herbs
    • 4.5 Seeds

Item delivery[edit | edit source]

These make up approximately 82% of all tasks.

Easy task items[edit | edit source]

Items
Anchovies Beer glass Bones
Bronze arrow Bronze bar Bronze dagger
Bronze axe Bronze mace Bronze med helm
Bronze spear Bronze sword Beer
Cadava berries Cooked chicken Cooked meat
Copper ore Cowhide Egg
Feather Grain Iron bar
Iron mace Iron ore Leather boots
Leather gloves Logs Molten glass
Potato Raw rat meat Rune essence
(pure accepted)
Shrimps Silk Leather
Tin ore Soft clay

Hard task items[edit | edit source]

Items
Ball of wool Bow string Bread
Bronze arrowtips Bronze knife Bronze warhammer
Bronze wire Headless arrow Swamp paste
Iron arrowtips Iron knife Iron warhammer
Leather cowl Pot of flour Unfired pie dish
Unfired pot

Letter delivery[edit | edit source]

Some tasks require the player to deliver a letter to one of the following NPCs. In these cases the recipient will reward the player, rather than the Wise Old Man. The player can read the letter before delivering it. These make up approximately 16% of all tasks.

  • Abbot Langley in the Edgeville Monastery
  • Father Aereck of Lumbridge Church
  • Father Lawrence in Varrock
  • The High Priest of Entrana
  • The Oracle on Ice Mountain
  • Reldo, librarian of Varrock
  • Thurgo, south of Port Sarim

The thing under the bed[edit | edit source]

Finally, the Wise Old Man will occasionally ask the player to investigate the thing under his bed; the player must then defeat it in combat. These make up approximately 2% of all tasks.

Rewards[edit | edit source]

Upon completing an item or delivery task, the player will receive either Prayer experience or a random reward from the lists below.

Prayer experience is rewarded 43.75% of the time, and ranges either between 185 and 215 experience (for an easy task), or 370 and 430 experience (for a hard task). This requires level 3 Prayer. The task reward for killing the thing under the bed is 280-300 Hitpoints experience.

Coins[edit | edit source]

An easy task will reward 185-215 coins, and a hard task will award 990-1020. If the player has less than level 3 Prayer, the rate for coins is 9/16.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Coins180–2202/16180–220180–220
Coins990–1,0202/16990–1,020990–1,020

The gem table is rolled 6.25% of the time.

Runes[edit | edit source]

The runes table is rolled 12.5% of the time. An easy task will reward 10 sets of runes, and a hard task will award 25. A "set of runes" consists of one of the following: 1 chaos, 1 nature, 1 law, 1 fire, 2 mind, 2 body, 2 earth, 2 water, 3 air runes. Each set is equally likely.

Chaos rune1–25Common69–1,72554–1,350
